title: Quran E Kareem by the ALLAH(GOD) himself to The Prophet Muhammad (Peace be upon him) for the humanity
Fawaaid E Makkiyyah by hazrat maulana Abdurrahman sahab makki (may he rest in peace)
Mukhtasar Al Quduri by maulana Muhammad aizaz ali (may he rest in peace)
Nahw Meer by meer syed shareef abul hasan ali bin Muhammad (may he rest in peace)
Aadaab E Muaashrat by Hakeem ul ummat maulana ashraf ali thanvi (may he rest in peace)
